602400.name: Fantasy Grounds - Perilous Places & Serious Situations (Savage Worlds)
602400.description:
Perilous Places & Serious Situations
Savage Worlds Handbook
This sourcebook library module contains ways to liven up your games by looking at
different locales and the varying dangers they present.
Inside youll find rules for expanded arctic and desert survival, the dangers of
collapsing tunnels and stampedes, fighting atop rooftops, crumbling cliffs, tall
columns, rope bridges, underwater, and on vertical surfaces, the hazards of stormy
nights and swamps, and expanded traps.
Perilous Places doesnt contain definitive, must-use rules. Instead, its a toolbox,
giving GMs plentiful options to suit any style of game, and allowing them to use
the same backdrop at varying power levels.
Players be warnedcombat just got a whole lot more perilous!
This product is an installable module for use with the Fantasy Ground II virtual
tabletop. The library module has been carefully organized to streamline gameplay
and includes library sections to help a GM prepare an adventure setting or to quickly
look up details on how to conduct encounters in unusual situations. The Savage Worlds
ruleset and a Full license of Fantasy Grounds II are required to use this product.
Author: Paul Wiggy Wade-Williams
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Ken Lavender
Updated by: Aki Heikkinen
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Aki Heikkinen
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
